CreateDataRepositoryTask.document: 创建上传文件系统数据到存储桶任务
CreateDataRepositoryTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: goosefs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDataRepositoryTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskName": "my_test_task",
    "FileSystemId": "x_c60_r3c4fa1f",
    "Bucket": "mybucket-1250000",
    "TaskPath": "aaa/bbb",
    "TaskType": "FS_TO_BUCKET",
    "RepositoryType": "MSP_AFM"
}
CreateDataRepositoryTask.title: 创建上传文件系统数据到存储桶任务

DescribeDataRepositoryTaskStatus.document: 创建数据流通任务后, 获取任务的状态
DescribeDataRepositoryTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: goosefs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDataRepositoryTaskStatus
<公共请求参数>

{
    "FileSystemId": "x_c60_r3c4fa1f",
    "TaskId": "x_task_xxf4"
}
DescribeDataRepositoryTaskStatus.title: 获取数据流通任务实时状态
